name: ISABELLA

description.short: Romantic A-line with French lace and versatile multi-way design.
description.full:
Details

  • Style: Romantic A-line
  • Fabric: Delicate All-over French Lace
  • Design: Versatile multi-way look
  • Size: Custom size

Features

  • Structured corset bodice with visible boning and a scalloped lace neckline.
  • Softly pleated A-line skirt that flows into a graceful floor-length finish.
  • Detachable draped off-shoulder sleeves for two distinct bridal looks.
  • Intricate lace craftsmanship perfect for vintage-themed or classic ceremonies.
  • Headpiece and veil are not included.

Pricing & Availability

  • Made to Rent
